Title: Ensures repeat offenders qualify for bail and pre-trial detention when the principal has been convicted of one or more misdemeanor or felony offenses
Summary: Ensures repeat offenders qualify for bail and pre-trial detention when the principal has been convicted of one or more misdemeanor or felony offenses within the immediate preceding five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to ensuring repeat offenders qualify for bail and pre-trial detention
